alert.note: Alert for Clay; Fillmore; York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 5:52PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Clay, southern York and Fillmore Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 551 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sutton, or 21 miles southwest of York, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Grafton around 600 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Geneva, Fairmont, Exeter and Milligan. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for south central and east central Nebraska.
